using System;
using System.Text.RegularExpressions;


namespace example
{
    
    
    public class TestClass
    {
        
        public string Value
        {
            get
            {
                return this.Value;
            }
            set
            {
                if ((value.Length < 10))
                {
                    throw new System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException();
                }
                if ((value.Length > 20))
                {
                    throw new System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException();
                }
                Regex regex = new Regex(@"(?=[a-zA-Z])(?=[a-yB-Z])");
                if (!regex.IsMatch(value))
                {
                    throw new System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException();
                }
                this.Value = value;
            }
        }
    }
}
